attributes.action: ensure that all special educational needs workers are given the special needs allowance on top of their salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people working with SLD and MLD students are not recieving special needs allowance yet the teachers are in reciept of this! I appreciate that each borough makes it's own determination of this payment yet feel that as it is we the staff who do as much of the work on the ground floor that we also should be entitled to this payment regardless of which local authority employs us.
